data.name: Freenergy
data.detailed_description:
You are an engineer who loves robots and science, but you have fallen into the hands of a corporation. And now you have to create war machines and control the battles, because this is the only way to save your life and the lives of your loved ones.

Key features:
- Robots can consist of several parts, each of which is a combat unit, with its own nuances.
- You have a total supply of energy that needs to be distributed among the units, which allows them to perform actions.
- Each ability has a condition scale that affects its efficiency.
- Abilities have a different activation time, allowing you to adapt against enemy actions and plan your attacks.
data.about_the_game:
You are an engineer who loves robots and science, but you have fallen into the hands of a corporation. And now you have to create war machines and control the battles, because this is the only way to save your life and the lives of your loved ones.

- Each ability has a condition scale that affects its efficiency.
- Abilities have a different activation time, allowing you to adapt against enemy actions and plan your attacks.
data.short_description: Develop your robot, combine abilities. Fight in turn-based mode, effectively distributing energy. Overcome all difficulties and gain freedom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support OpenGL 2.1 or higher. Intel HD 3000 or better.
  • Storage: 999 MB available space
